articles.description: The new AVTR 2825 can operate in different transmission modes (automated and manual) and deliver high fuel efficiency with its acceleration-based gear shifting, the company said.

articles.title: Exclusive | Mohit Burman: Plan to extend Eveready brand into new verticals, rejig board - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The Burman family, the single largest shareholder of Eveready Industries, holding 19.85 per cent stake, has made an open offer to acquire an additional 26 percent share of the Khaitans-promoted company for Rs 604.76 crore.
